Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.game.Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
MultiplayerGame, SinglePlayerGame
public abstract class Game
extends it.polimi.ingsw.utils.observer.Observable
Abstract Game class that extends Observable. This class contains the number of players, the list of players, the global board which is used by the players to play, the player that wins the game and the current player that has the right to play the turn.

      Throws:

      it.polimi.ingsw.utils.exceptions.PlayerWithSameNameException - when a player with the same nickname already is in the game.
